titleStmt.title: La muse de cavalier, or, An apology for such gentlemen as make poetry their diversion, not their business : in a letter from a scholar of Mars to one of Apollo.
titleStmt.author: Cutts, John Cutts, Baron, 1661-1707.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Baron John Cutts. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
